bibl.title: Demise of the Daughter Library.
bibl.note: The Christian attack in 391 A.D. put an end to the Serapeum and to the Daughter Library incorporated within the temple.

bibl.seg: EL-ABBADI Mostafa A., Demise of the Daughter Library.
Mostafa EL-ABBADI and Omnia Mounir FATHALLAH (Edd.), What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? = Library of the Written Word. 3. The Manuscript World. 1 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 89-93.
The Christian attack in 391 A.D. put an end to the Serapeum and to the Daughter Library incorporated within the temple.
